DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this non-interventional study is to evaluate the current status of diabetes management, control, and complications in subjects with type 2 diabetes in Malaysia.
DOC.brief_title: A Cross-Sectional Survey to Evaluate Diabetes Management, Control, Complications, Psychosocial Aspects of Patients With Type 2 Diabetes in Malaysia
DOC.criteria: People with type 2 diabetes mellitus (DM) who are being treated, with any of the nonpharmacological or pharmacological options, at a particular centre for at least 2 years and who have visited the centre within the last 36 months Patients willing to sign informed consent form Previous participation in this study Unable to comply with protocol requirements Confirmed or suspected pregnancy
